create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts spiritual rap visual
Primary request: Ganga Aarti night energy with devotional lamps and rhythmic motion.
Scene/background: Har Ki Pauri style Ganga Aarti evening ambience at river ghats
Subject: rows of diyas, ceremonial lamps, smoke trails, river reflections
Action: 0-4s diya close-ups and sparks; 4-8s synchronized lamp arcs; 8-12s wide glowing river reflection
Camera: vertical handheld cinematic with smooth motion and fast inserts
Lighting/mood: night scene with warm firelight and deep blue ambience
Color palette: amber flame, deep blue, black
Style/format: contemporary high-energy shorts style, cinematic realism, no text overlays
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no branded text, no identifiable real people, no copyrighted characters
Avoid: flicker, text artifacts, logos, watermark, deformed faces
